headingBlock.heading: Closer to what you love
headingBlock.paragraph: Family, friends, creations — Windows 11 is the one place for it all. With a fresh new feel and tools that make it easier to be efficient, it has what you need for whatever’s next

headingBlock.heading: Snap into focus
headingBlock.paragraph: Snap Assist and Snap Groups are just two of the features you can use to optimise your screen space for a clean, focused workflow.

headingBlock.heading: Life’s better together
headingBlock.paragraph: Chat to check in or video call to get face-to-face. Microsoft Teams on Windows 11 makes it easy to keep in touch.
headingBlock.legalText:
1Certain features require specific hardware, see URL for Windows.com coming 24/06/2021. Chatting via SMS is available in limited countries and will be made available to other geos on a rolling basis. Please refer to this page for more details. Internet access required, ISP fees may apply.
2You can meet with anyone in a 1:1 call and speak for up to 24 hours for free. For a group call (more than two people), you can meet with up to 100 participants and call up to 60 mins for free. We are waiving these limits in light of COVID-19 so that you can meet with up to 300 participants and speak for up to 24 hours for free until further specified.

headingBlock.heading: All things you. All at a glance, always a swipe away.
headingBlock.paragraph: Your favourite photos. The world news. Today’s to-do list and tomorrow’s weather. Widgets help you find content that matters to you.

headingBlock.heading: Choose the browser that puts you first.
headingBlock.paragraph: Work, play, shop, stream, connect—whatever you set out to do, Microsoft Edge on Windows 11 helps you do it with speed and security.

headingBlock.heading: Everything you need for work or play
headingBlock.paragraph: The apps you need to do. The programmes you love to watch. Find them fast with the redesigned Microsoft Store.
